title: Design Portfolio
description: A showcase of my design work, featuring a collection of projects that highlight my skills and creativity. Each project is presented with a detailed description, including the problem it solves, the design process, and the final solution. The portfolio is built using Astro, a modern static site generator, and Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework. The source code is available on GitHub

title: Budgee
description: A personal finance app that helps users manage their budgets, track expenses, and achieve their financial goals. Budgee offers a user-friendly interface with features like expense categorization, budget planning, and financial insights. The app is built using React TypeScript for cross-platform compatibility and integrates with various financial APIs for real-time data synchronization.

title: Sakay Cebu
description: A transportation app that helps users find and book rental vehicles in Cebu. Sakay Cebu offers a user-friendly interface with features like vehicle search, booking management, and real-time availability tracking. The app is built using React Typescript for cross-platform compatibility.

title: ROME
description: A room rental WebApp that helps users find and book rental rooms in Cebu. ROME offers a user-friendly interface with features like room search, booking management, and real-time availability tracking. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: BusQ
description: A bus booking WebApp that helps users seamlessly and book bus tickets in Cebu. BusQ offers a user-friendly interface with features like bus search, booking management, and real-time availability tracking. The app is built using TypeScript, Next.js, and Node.js.

title: Binary
description: A platform that helps students understand Binary conversion. Binary offers a user-friendly interface with features like Binary to Decimal conversion, Decimal to Binary conversion, and Binary to Hexadecimal conversion. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Exponential Functions
description: A platform that helps students understand Exponential Functions. It offers a user-friendly interface with features like function visualization, interactive graphs, and real-world applications. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Snarp
description: My first ever portfolio design. It showcases my skills and projects. The portfolio is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
